arguments.value: Opps, You will need to contact the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Opps, You will need to contact the owner"

nodes.documentation:
** 
Checks if the caller of the contract is owner or not?
If yes, then only proceed to the Function whatever you are doing.***
nodes.name: isOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are Not authorised to Access the data"

arguments.value: You are Not authorised to Access the data

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are Not authorised to Access the data"

nodes.documentation:
** 
Checks if the caller of the contract is Doctor or Patient?
If yes, then only proceed to the Function whatever you are doing.***
nodes.name: onlyDoctor

nodes.documentation:
** 
Updates the doctorsAddress in the database of authorised doctors.
Along with this, check for the isOwner, if the caller is owner, then only it is allowed to Add the address.
Parameter passed -
_doctorAddress***

addAuthorisedDoctor(address).notice: **  Updates the doctorsAddress in the database of authorised doctors. Along with this, check for the isOwner, if the caller is owner, then only it is allowed to Add the address. Parameter passed - _doctorAddress***
